title: Engineering Design Innovation Course Based on a Virtual Design Studio

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering design theories and experience in utilizing CAD tools
context.additional_context: Practical design project-centered education for professionals to integrate with their work

learning_goals: Learners can analyze over 30 peer design works and develop design improvement strategies through social comparison.
Learners achieve active participation competencies by posting feedback at least twice weekly and engaging in over 10 comment activities in a virtual studio.
Learners can achieve over 85% completeness in final deliverables by utilizing a peer review system during a 3-stage design prototype development process.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
